titles.title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to eliminate funding for highway demonstration projects.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

bill.summary: 2/2/1994--Introduced. Amends the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to eliminate funding for specified highway demonstration projects, including projects for high cost bridges, congestion relief, high priority segments of the National Highway System, and rural and urban access, innovative, and priority intermodal transportation.
